name: EverCraft Online
summary: A world of adventure and excitement awaits you in Adrullan! Getting back to the classic roots of the MMORPG genre, EverCraft Online is designed to be a demanding, yet rewarding multiplayer experience. Band together and forge friendships as you slay epic beast, master ancient magics, craft potions and armor, and befriend or pillage unique civilizations. Bend destiny to your will as you travel a world long abandoned by the gods, unraveling the mystery of their divine power as it slowly seeps back into the land. Race to harness the might of their divine arcana -before your enemies get their first.
